item.title: First Episode!
item.author: Mostly Node
item.description:
Intro - Each give reasons for starting a podcast on Node

Main talking Points: http://nodeweekly.com/ https://github.com/feross/standard Switching text editors for a time (From Emacs to Sublime) (Add any of your topics and we can adjust accordingly)

Any Social Media You want to Promote: Josiah @kickinbahk kickinbahk.com Jason @jason_small jasonsmall.io
